objects.specification: A flat rectangular plane covering the entire classroom area, designed as a floor surface. The floor material uses a realistic soil and stone texture with earthy brown and gray hues, simulating a prehistoric terrain theme. The edges are slightly beveled, and the surface exhibits subtle roughness and natural irregularities for an authentic feel.

A vertical rectangular wall panel forming the front boundary of the classroom. It has a smooth surface painted in a natural earthy or forest green tone. The wall is of uniform thickness with a slight beveled edge and a matte finish to reduce glare.

A vertical rectangular wall panel forming the back boundary of the classroom. It has a smooth surface painted in a natural earthy or forest green tone. The wall is of uniform thickness with a slight beveled edge and a matte finish to reduce glare.

A vertical rectangular wall panel forming the left boundary of the classroom. It has a smooth surface painted in a natural earthy or forest green tone. The wall is of uniform thickness with a slight beveled edge and a matte finish to reduce glare.

A vertical rectangular wall panel forming the right boundary of the classroom. It has a smooth surface painted in a natural earthy or forest green tone. The wall is of uniform thickness with a slight beveled edge and a matte finish to reduce glare.

A large horizontal rectangular blackboard mounted on the wall. It features a dark matte writing surface framed by a slim wooden or metal trim. The board has a smooth finish suitable for chalk or marker use, with subtle bevel detail on the frame and hidden mounting hardware.

A sturdy rectangular teacher’s desk with a flat top surface and four solid table legs. The desk is designed in a warm wooden tone with visible grain texture, featuring smooth beveled edges and subtle chamfers on the corners. The underside may include simple drawers or storage compartments for functionality.

A spherical globe model mounted on a slender stand. The globe surface displays a stylized prehistoric Earth or dinosaur era map, rendered in muted blues and greens. The stand has a subtle metallic finish and the sphere is polished to allow smooth rotation.

An individual rectangular student desk with a flat top surface and four slender legs. The desk has a subtle wooden texture in an earthy tone with slightly rounded edges. The design is simple and functional, suitable for a classroom environment.

A single classroom chair with a wooden seat and backrest supported by a lightweight frame. The backrest has a slight ergonomic curve, and the seat is subtly contoured. The finish is a warm natural wood shade with smooth matte surfaces.

A detailed dinosaur sculpture with realistic scaled skin, subtle musculature and a textured surface in earthy tones. The figure has a sturdy stance and distinctive prehistoric features, scaled to be decorative without overwhelming the classroom space.

A rectangular dinosaur-themed educational poster featuring vibrant illustrations of prehistoric creatures and informative text. The poster has a thin flush-mounted frame and a glossy surface, with bright colors and clear graphics to engage viewers.

A tall multi-shelf wooden bookshelf designed to hold books. The shelf has evenly spaced compartments with a warm wood grain texture and subtle beveled trim. The shelves display a variety of book spines in vibrant dinosaur-related colors, and the overall finish is matte.

A potted plant in a simple sculpted pot with a ceramic or clay finish. The plant features lush prehistoric foliage reminiscent of ferns, with multiple leaf fronds in rich green hues. The pot has a smooth matte surface with slight patina.

A circular wall clock with a simple frame and an analog face. The clock has clear numeric markings, two slender hands, and a contrasting background. The frame is slim in a neutral tone, and the surface is slightly reflective for a polished look.
